casebody.data:
HSBC BANK USA, N.A., Respondent,
v.
Christopher N. CROSSLAND, etc., Appellant, et al., Defendants. 2017-1077 Court of Appeals of New York. January 9, 2018

Motion for leave to appeal dismissed upon the ground that the order sought to be appealed from does not finally determine the action within the meaning of the Constitution.

Motion for poor person relief dismissed as academic.

Motion for a stay dismissed as academic.
